hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Abu'l-Qasim (the kunya of the Holy Prophet) (ﷺ) as saying:There is a time on Friday at which no Muslim would stand and pray and beg Allah for what Is good but He would give it to him; and he pointed with his hand that (this time) is short and narrow

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي السَّاعَةِ الَّتِي فِي يَوْمِ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The (special) time that occurs on Friday
